name: hmac
description: Creates a keyed-hash message authentication code (HMAC), which can be used to verify authenticity and integrity of a message by two parties that share the key.

params.name: message
params.description: The message or data to authenticate

params.name: algorithm
params.description: An algorithm supported by the java crypto provider, for example HMACSHA256

params.name: encoding
params.description: The character encoding to use when converting the message to bytes. Must be a character encoding name recognized by the Java runtime.
